overview:
Currently serving as CEO of Cabulous, Steve Humphreys is a two-time public company CEO and serial entrepreneur.

Prior to Cabulous, Steve was CEO of Kleer Corporation (now part of Standard Microsystems), a consumer audio company that pioneered high-quality wireless headphones. Prior to Kleer, Steve was CEO of public-company ActivIdentity, the leader in secure identities for defense, intelligence and enterprise applications (now part of HID Global).

Steve’s first startup was SCM Microsystems, which he took through several venture rounds and a successful IPO. Steve’s first public company leadership role was as President of Caere, the leader in OCR software (now part of Nuance). Prior to that, Steve spent nearly decade in General Electric businesses worldwide.

Steve has an Engineering Masters’ degree at Stanford, an MBA from Stanford’s Graduate School of Business and an Engineering Bachelor’s from Yale.
